product_name: UCO Citronella Tealight Candles - Package of 6
long_description: Burn these Uco Citronella Tealight Candles in your Uco candle lantern (sold separately) to keep annoying insects away while bringing quality light to your campsite. Citronella oil is mixed with paraffin wax; the scent that releases as the candle burns creates a natural insect repellent. Designed specifically for the Uco Mini and Micro candle lanterns (sold separately). Each candle offers 3 - 4 hrs. of burn time. Includes 6 Uco Citronella Tealight Candles.
short_description: Burn these Uco Citronella Tealight Candles in your Uco candle lantern (sold separately) to keep annoying insects away while bringing quality light to your campsite.
